content:
- Minister za industrijo in ne za gospodarstvo
- "a leading anti-Syrian Lebanese minister and Maronite Christian
leader" in ne "poznan po svoji pro-sirski politiki"
- "a member of the Phalange Party and the son of former President
Gemayel Amin" in ne "vodilni sin" itd.

V tako kratkem "članku" !?!
Povzemanje je posebna sposobnost, naučiti se je bo treba.
Zainteresirani lahko preverite original: news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/...169606.stm
author: anon-98776
